metadata.title: CVE-2015-5714 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WordPress before 4.3.1 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by leveraging themishandling of unclosed HTML elements during processing of shortcode tags.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5714` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfourteen - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentythirteen - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1+dfsg-1').
